desc.html:
The diagram depicts development of hybrid culture in Assam and surrounding regions due to assimilation of various ethno-cultural groups belonging to the major linguistic groups in different phases of time.

Source: 1. image from NASA 2. data source: Barpujari H.K. (ed), The Comprehensive History of Assam Vol I, II, Kakati B. K., Assamese Its Formation and Development, etc.
